title: NBA 2K15 v1.0
description:
The NBA 2K franchise returns with NBA 2K15, our most true-to-life NBA experience yet on mobile. Featuring NBA MVP Kevin Durant and an eclectic soundtrack curated by internationally-renowned artist and producer Pharrell Williams, NBA 2K15 hits the court with vastly improved graphics, ultra-realistic NBA gameplay, and more.
